name: 2295 Necrosys
description:
Welcome to Necrosys, a planet with an unstable atmosphere and a lot of dimensional holes, that can change the reality around you.

You play with a space marine that is trying to stabilize the holes to go back home. Luckily, your suit is able to store the power of these dimensional holes and you can use them as you progress.

On this demo, you will be able to use the power of the speeding dimensional hole, which powers up the gears that you will find in the game.

A game by:

Danilo de Assis Pelaes (Programming & HUD)

Guilherme Magalhães Guerra (Pixel Art & UI)

Gustavo Segato Gazzeta (Programming, Level Design & Game Design)

Matheus de Oliveira Rosa (Programming & Game Design)
